title: NEPRA’s employees to donate on day salary to PM COVID-19 fund
content:
ISLAMABAD, Apr 07 (APP):In response to the PM call to donate funds to the Prime Minister’s COVID-19 Pandemic Relief Fund-2020, the National Electric Regulatory Authority (NEPRA) employees have decided to contribute one day’s salary to the cause, said a press release.
